titles: The speech of the Honourable Sr. VVilliam Berkeley governour and capt. generall of Virginea, to the burgesses in the Grand Assembly at James Towne on the 17 of March, 1651 : together with a declaration of the whole country, occasioned upon the sight of a printed paper from England, intituled An act, &c.
author: Berkeley, William, Sir, 1608-1677.
publisher: Printed by Samuell Broun English bookseller,
notes: Imperfect: tightly bound, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the Trinity College Library, Dublin University.
